thread.title: Huis der Nerderlanden re-zoned

author: news24.com
title: Huis der Nerderlanden re-zoned
text:
Tradition will have it that the Hollandia Food Trailer, now known as The Urban Bistro, trade at The Dutch Library every 2nd and last Saturday of the month.
The Dutch Library, which houses thousands of historical books, is located in Het Huis der Nederlanden in Pinelands and also serves as a social center for all Dutch, Vlamish and Afrikaans residents
I am not sure if you have been made aware that a Municipal Notice, here attached, has been posted for the rezoning of erf 1958 or otherwise known as the Huis der Nerderlanden.
A cultural home to thousands of people must make way for another commercial disaster that wouldn't fit in Pinelands at all.
Because of our partnership with the Dutch Library, we are offering our support to raise awareness of the loss this would mean to the Dutch community and are offering to start a petition to object to the rezoning.
On October 24th we will have our Food Trailer with all the Dutch imports at the Dutch Library and we would like for you to get involved saving Het Huis der Nederlanden. It would be sad if the colour orange had to disappear from the Pinelands grounds.
We would be very appreciative for your input and involvement in the matter.
We can use all the support we can get!!
Kind regards
Peter van GeinHollandia/The Urban BistroCell 083 270 3705email: starving@theurbanbistro.co.za
